activities: Elijah Ltd. specializes in computer forensics and electronic discovery services, offered primarily in the context of litigation matters at the direction of legal counsel.  We often are asked to perform forensic collections of electronic data, perform searches of the data designed to identify potentially relevant information, and provide the potentially relevant data to legal counsel for review in a searchable format.
personaldata: Client data - we do not cover manually processed data because we do not handle such data
recoursemech: Elijah has further committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.
